saveScores() - Static method in class main.java.ScoreRecorder
Save the scores to a file titled by SCOREFILE.
scanner - Static variable in class main.java.GameEnvironment
A static scanner used throughout the class.
score() - Static method in class main.java.GameVariables
Calculates the final score based on the farm's money and animals.
scoreNames - Static variable in class main.java.ScoreRecorder
A list of names to go with scores.
ScoreRecorder - Class in main.java
Reads and writes the highest scores to a file named scores.data.
ScoreRecorder() - Constructor for class main.java.ScoreRecorder
 
scores - Static variable in class main.java.ScoreRecorder
A list of scores.
sellProducts() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Sell all of the player's products in the farm's inventory generated by harvesting crops or from animals.
setLayer(JPanel) - Method in class main.swing.GameWindow
Sets the layer of all Components in layeredPane to 0, then sets the layer of topPanel to 1 to bring it to the front of the frame.
setupFromWindow() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Called from the setup window when using the GUI.
setupGame() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
The main gameplay method for the game when in command line mode.
sleep() - Method in class main.java.animals.Animal
Called at the end of each day for all animals.
sleep() - Method in class main.java.crops.Crop
Called at the end of each day for all planted crops.
sortScores() - Static method in class main.java.ScoreRecorder
Sort the scores from highest to lowest and removes the lowest scores until only the top 5 are present.
startGame() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
The main gameplay method for the game when in command line mode.
startingMoney - Static variable in class main.java.GameVariables
The amount of money the player should start with.
store - Static variable in class main.java.GameVariables
Reference to the game's store.
Store - Class in main.java
The in game store.
Store() - Constructor for class main.java.Store
Construct a new store with all available types of items and animals.
